div.div: Consent for Disclosure of Immunization Information to Local and State Health Departments

span.style: color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small;

br.span: This letter of consent is state-mandated and must be signed and returned on or before Wednesday, November 5th.
